name: Extract Basic Details
template:
Extract the following fields from the provided certification documents:
- Certification name (string)
- Issuing organization (string)
- Validity period (string)
- Scope (array of strings)

Return the data in JSON format with this exact structure:
{
  "certificateName": "",
  "issuingOrganization": "",
  "validity": "",
  "scope": []
}

name: Full Certification Schema
template: Extract the complete set of fields from the document including optional metadata like issuer address, certification level, and digital signatures. Return in structured JSON format.

name: EU Compliance Focus
template: Focus on extracting GDPR compliance, CE markings, and EN standard references from EU-issued certificates. Structure output in GDPR JSON schema.

name: Full Certification Extractor
description: Extract full structured certification JSON from text input.

name: Extract Certification Name
description: Extracts only the certification scheme name
